title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 256.6 - Required rooms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 256.6 - Required rooms

State Regulations

Where the operation requires, the following rooms shall be
provided to carry on the business of salvage. Receiving room, sorting and
cutting room, cleaning room (kitchen), storage area for reconditioned
merchandise and waste room. If retail sales are made on the premises, a
separate room shall be provided for this purpose. Where frozen or refrigerated
foods are handled, refrigerators, freezer rooms and/or freezer cabinets shall
be provided. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
256.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
